title: Prepare your data for ML  | Text Classification Tutorial Pt. 1 (Coding TensorFlow)
excerpt: @lmoroney is back with another episode of Coding TensorFlow!  In this episode, we discuss Text Classification, which assigns categories to text documents. This is part 1 of a 2 part sub series that focuses on the data and gets it ready to train a neural network. Laurence also explains the unique challenges
